title: Are there midterm and final exams?
answers: Yes, there are both midterm and final exams in this course.
The midterm exam is usually held in the middle of the semester, and the final exam is at the end of the semester.

title: How many assignments are there in this course?
answers: There are typically 4-5 assignments throughout the semester.
The assignments are evenly spread out and cover different topics from the course material.

title: Is attendance mandatory for this course?
answers: Attendance is highly recommended but not strictly mandatory.
However, regular attendance can help you stay engaged and better understand the course content.

title: What programming languages are used in this course?
answers: The primary programming language used in this course is JavaScript.
We will also be using HTML and CSS for web development purposes.

title: Are there any group projects in this course?
answers: Yes, there is usually one group project towards the end of the semester.
The group project allows you to collaborate with your classmates and apply the concepts learned in the course.
